channel.title: My first MoparScape
channel.description:
Hello! My name is Infestor1 and I am a runescape level 45. I saw lots of videos from Youtube about scumscape (moparscape client) and it was sooooo cool! The guy was level 556 and the highest RS2 level is 126! So... I have a few questions.
1• How do you create a MoparScape server? 2• What is the Server Password? 3• When you click "Start Server" what do you do? 4• How can you create new places on your server? 5• How can you make yourself, and other people Moderators on your server? 6• How can you get a lot of items (I saw one server screenshot, and a guy made Mod Island, how did he get all those rares on there? 7• My friend said you could type in a code to get items, he said if you type: pickup:2043 , then a Blue Phat would popup under you. Is that true? 8• How do other people get onto your server? 9• How do you edit the levels of people? 10• What is that black box at the bottom of the screen?
[b][u]So there were my ten questions. Can someone please answer all of them and put in a very detailed answer? Thanks.
~îñƒés†ø®1[/u][/b]

5• How can you make yourself, and other people Moderators on your server?

in your file, open up there document name,

there should be Player rights = 0,1,2 or 3, make it either 1

item.title: My first MoparScape
item.dc:creator: @infestor1 infestor1
item.description:
@infestor1 wrote:

Hello! My name is Infestor1 and I am a runescape level 45. I saw lots of videos from Youtube about scumscape (moparscape client) and it was sooooo cool! The guy was level 556 and the highest RS2 level is 126! So… I have a few questions.

1• How do you create a MoparScape server?
2• What is the Server Password?
3• When you click “Start Server” what do you do?
4• How can you create new places on your server?
5• How can you make yourself, and other people Moderators on your server?
6• How can you get a lot of items (I saw one server screenshot, and a guy made Mod Island, how did he get all those rares on there?
7• My friend said you could type in a code to get items, he said if you type: pickup:2043 , then a Blue Phat would popup under you. Is that true?
8• How do other people get onto your server?
9• How do you edit the levels of people?
10• What is that black box at the bottom of the screen?

[b][u]So there were my ten questions. Can someone please answer all of them and put in a very detailed answer? Thanks.

~îñƒés†ø®1[/u][/b]

Read full topic
